mapper.insert: insert into tbl_inventory select seq_inventory_no.nextval, member_id, order_qnt as inv_qnt, o.barcode AS barcode, o.pname AS pname, CATEGORY, GET_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, sysdate+EXPIRE_TERM AS expire_date, DISCOUNT_RATE, '0' FROM TBL_HEAD h JOIN (SELECT member_id, barcode, pname, order_qnt FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE wrap_no = #{wrap_no}) o ON o.barcode = h.barcode
mapper.update: update tbl_inventory set inv_qnt = #{inv_qnt} where inventory_no = #{inventory_no}

insert into tbl_scrap select seq_scrap_no.nextval, a.* from(
select #{ex.member_id} as member_id, #{ex.barcode} as barcode, #{ex.pname} as pname, #{ex.category} as category, #{ex.get_price} as get_price, sysdate, #{ex.expire_date} as expire_date, #{ex.scrap_qnt} as scrap_qnt from dual ) a
mapper.select: select large from tbl_inventory i INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY c on i.CATEGORY = c.CATEGORY group by large
select count(inventory_no) from tbl_inventory i inner join tbl_category c on i.category = c.category where 1>0
